events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me at all.
The system has categorized the request as Refund based on the customer's mention of refund and return.
Your refund request case has been assigned to an agent who will assist you shortly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, unworn, and still has all the tags attached as received.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund request and you will receive your money back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help with this matter.
The refund process has been completed successfully on our end, and your case is now resolved.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
As the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are now closing this support case.
You will shortly receive a survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and customer support service.
